channel.title: CVE Feed for ArtistScope -- CopySafe Web Protection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ArtistScope -- CopySafe Web Protection

item.title: CVE-2024-38781|2024-07-23T14:52:58.410Z -- artistscope -- copysafe%20web%20protection
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ArtistScope CopySafe Web Protection allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects CopySafe Web Protection: from n/a through 3.15.
